snippet.title: Kotodama - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/997060/Kotodama_The_7_Mysteries_of_Fujisawa/

Pre-Order on Switch (EU) today!
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/Kotodama-The-7-Mysteries-of-Fujisawa-1544876.html

Welcome to Fujisawa Academy – an educational institution where nothing is as it seems and every pupil hides a dark secret.  Use the power of words to interrogate your target and strip them to expose the truth behind their lies!

Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam on 31st May in Europe and 4th June in North America.

http://pqube.co.uk/kotodama/

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! 
https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU

#Kotodama
